page.title: 02SHOPPING IN S.E.LUTON(1)
page.content:
The main shops in Luton are in The Arndale Centre.Very often people go there in cars and there is a car park which holds 2300 cars.
The"Arndale"(as everybody calls it)looks very,very new as if it has just been built.When you go into the Centre it seems like a completely different world because it is so tidy.It is always busy.In the summer air conditioning keeps you cool but in the winter central heating keeps you warm.You can rest in the seats that are there or have a cup of tea or coffee.There are lots of cafes or you can go to your bank.
It is great when I meet my friend in Debenhams because we keep hiding from our mums.Then we go back home to play.
